r.s: An extension for sending push notifications to iOS and OS X devices from within your PHP code
r.d: apn is a PHP extension to introduce simple yet powerful interface for sending push notifications to iOS and OS X devices from within your PHP code
r.n: - Fixed typo in constant name (APN_PODUCTION -> APN_PRODUCTION) - Incorrect warning message in apn_feedback() - Added "invalid token" warning in apn_send() - TSRM fixes
